title: my thoughts on bans for being toxic
body:
If you honestly cant take things like "fuck this teams bad" you should probably not be a part of society. like people get insulted, get mad, and say offensive shit to people all the time in real life. you dont see the popos coming in and arresting people right? 

people are pansies these days

replies.body: "Your liberty to swing your fist ends just where my nose begins." -Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Try saying that stuff to your boss, or a random person on the street maybe. Then come back! Tell us how it went!
Well this is league.
Yeah and? Being an asshat won't get you shit IRL! What makes it "okay" in any online game?!
What? You really don't get it do you.
i bet youre also the type of person to embrace Hilary Clinton at 2am on a saturday night

OH LOOK! Its resorted to insults now!
https://i.gyazo.com/1879ddad395eac2137cba238079be701.png

This is gonna get good!
how is that an insult lol
I don't give a damn about politics most of the time. AND its irrelevent to the matter anyways!
but apparently my job is super relevant to this topic
I was trying to make a point. I bet if ANYONE said that stuff to their bosses they would be fired!
good thing i dont play league with my boss
And being an asshole to other players isn't okay either!
WHY?!  YOU REALLY NEED TO ASK THAT QUESTION?!
why
Did you think before posting that?
good luck keeping a job with that attitude.

Former military brah here.  Now a chem engineer at a paper company.  I work on the floor of a paper mill on a daily basis.  It's fraternal, it's dirty and it's loud.   Kinda like the military haha.  I will say this with 100% honesty, we speak to each other on the paper mill floor in the most vile way imaginable sometimes, the mill superintendents included.  It's one of the reasons I love my job so much.  It's not uncommon for someone, on a daily basis, to go up one side and down the other of a co-worker who fucks something up.  It's a glorious place to work from my perspective.
Also look at trump, hes an "asshat" and he has lots of "shit" about 4billion dollars worth of "shit"
https://catmacros.files.wordpress.com/2009/08/whoop_de_doo_cat.jpg
You're right dude. Instead of breeding confident winners, this generation is becoming pansy beta males with no self respect tattling whenever they can. League is nothing but a safe space these days.

> [{quoted}](name=StickyOctopi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wXE1jzFq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-01T11:39:51.358+0000)
>
> You're right dude. Instead of breeding confident winners, this generation is becoming pansy beta males with no self respect tattling whenever they can. League is nothing but a safe space these days.

Don't worry. You'll understand when you are older.
so when i become older like you ill continue to stay up all night watching someones thread and downvote everything i dont agree with. k dad
http://cdn.niketalk.com/5/58/900x900px-LL-58cf3418_salt_intensifies.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Nice Fellow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wXE1jzFq,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2016-05-01T11:53:16.017+0000)
>
> so when i become older like you ill continue to stay up all night watching someones thread and downvote everything i dont agree with. k dad

I'm at work.
you should probably work instead of browsing a video game forum then

> [{quoted}](name=Nice Fellow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wXE1jzFq,comment-id=00020001000000010000,timestamp=2016-05-01T12:06:11.562+0000)
>
> you should probably work instead of browsing a video game forum then

Meh, it's only a couple minutes out of my day.
does your boss know? you should tell your boss about your couple minutes out of your day that hes paying for

Obviously I understand more than you do if you don't see where society is headed based off off mindsets like that at riot games. 

Maybe read 1984 if you're capable of grasping the underlying concept. One step closer to thought police every time we restrict people.

> [{quoted}](name=StickyOctopi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wXE1jzFq,comment-id=000200010001,timestamp=2016-05-01T11:56:10.725+0000)
>
> Obviously I understand more than you do if you don't see where society is headed based off off mindsets like that at riot games. 
> 
> Maybe read 1984 if you're capable of grasping the underlying concept. One step closer to thought police every time we restrict people.

I understand the concept of the reduction of the English language, however, you are encouraging the usage of crude words that people already use instead of being properly descriptive. It's funny you bring this up, actually. 

In a thread 4 months ago about Kickstarter rewards, people with too much money, and bad characters, I saw the word autism used in the way you described. The overuse of the word fuck or conjugation of autism is for more like 1984 than censoring.

However, there is no thought policing going on here. The problem is that people are too long used to being ass hats to random people on the Internet and thinking it is due justice. This isn't about censoring the word retard so not to encourage use of the word and offend a group.

This is 'don't be an ass hole on the Internet.' Do you truly want to stand up for freedom of expression simply so you can try and offend people you don't know?
i cant upvote this enough
Well both of us are going to be downvoted to oblivion by the hivemind anyways.
Sad that more people cant see the bigger picture

ikr, whats wrong with our generation?

apparently asking someone if they were "dropped as a child" is offensive and can be reported. 

No chill these days
It's people like you what cause unrest.

Rationalizing with you will be pointless, so I won't try too. 

One day you will have an epiphany, today is clearly not that day. 
#Pearls before Swine
